articles.description: Great Britain win silver in the men's team pursuit to secure a third medal in as many days in the Paris Olympic velodrome.
articles.title: Olympics track cycling: Great Britain win men's team pursuit silver

articles.description: Britain's George Mills was involved in a dramatic collision and fiery confrontation as the men's 5,000 heats boiled over on day 12 at the Olympics.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Top five stories from Day 12 of 2024 Games

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: A member of Australia's hockey team is arrested in Paris and is in custody for allegedly buying cocaine.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Australia hockey player arrested for allegedly buying cocaine

articles.description: Spain captain Alvaro Morata and team-mate Rodri are banned for one game by Uefa after they chanted "Gibraltar is Spanish" during their side's Euro 2024 victory celebrations.
articles.title: Alvaro Morata & Rodri banned for 'Gibraltar is Spanish' chant during Euro 2024 celebrations

articles.description: BBC Sport followed Lee Carsley's England U21 team as they won the 2023 European Championships and explain his brand of football.
articles.title: Lee Carsley: England's likely interim manager plays brand of football dubbed 'Carsball'

articles.description: Josh Kerr says the opportunity to win 1500m gold at Los Angeles 2028 and complete the full set of Olympic medals will drive him on for the next four years.
articles.title: Olympic Games 2024: Josh Kerr eyes LA gold in Hollywood ending

articles.description: McLaren boss Zak Brown says he is "surprised" by his team's F1 title challenge this season.
articles.title: McLaren boss Zak Brown on F1 title challenge, Red Bull and Adrian Newey

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at what the Premier League can expect from this season's new managers.
articles.title: New Premier League managers: What can fans expect from new bosses?
